title: Can I sue my book publisher for breach of contract? - Legal Answers
snippet: Mar 6, 2012 · Any question about bringing a lawsuit for "breach of contract" begins with reading the contract. Usually, contracts will have choice of law and choice of forum provisions in them. They may also call for arbitration rather than suit in court. So, until you show an attorney the contract, no one will be truly to give you a plan of action here. Yes, you can sue your book publisher for breach of ...

title: Are jailbait sites illegal (how is it possible they exist)? - Legal Answers
snippet: Dec 20, 2019 · Sometimes I view normal pornsites, and tags like "teen" usually don't actually mean "teen", so it's a common category there. When you click on sites related with this tag, it happens very quickly that you might find a redirection to forums called "jailbait". They exist on the normal internet, no registration needed, the threads are clicked millions of times and have thousands of comments ...
